actions.text: Committee on Foreign Relations ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Foreign Relations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Percy. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Budget.
Committee on Budget. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Budget. Reported to Senate by Senator Domenici without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 259.
Motion to proceed to consideration of measure agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Motion to recommit to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 33-61. Record Vote No: 235.
Motion to recommit to Senate Committee on Budget tabled in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 62-33. Record Vote No: 236.
Motion to recommit to Senate Committee on Appropriations withdrawn in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 64-30. Record Vote No: 237.

official_title: An original resolution waiving section 402(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 602.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 602 (radio broadcasting to Cuba).

titles.title: An original resolution waiving section 402(a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 602.
